meta_description: FMoPA collects, preserves, and exhibits historic and contemporary works by nationally and internationally known photographic artists.
admission_text:
## Plan Your Visit 

#### MUSEUM LOCATION

1630 E. 7th Avenue Ybor.  
Tampa, Florida 33605  
813-221-2222

### [Admission](https://www.fmopa.org/online-reservation-only/)

FREE for Museum Members  
FREE for children under eight years old  
$12 Adults  
$10 Students/Military/Seniors

[Code of Conduct](https://www.fmopa.org/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/Code-of-Conduct-May-2025.pdf)

#### PLAN YOUR VISIT

Tuesday: 10 am – 5 pm

Wednesday: 10 am – 5 pm

Thursday: 10 am – 5 pm

Friday: 10 am – 5 pm

Saturday: 10 am – 5 pm

Sunday: 12 pm – 5 pm

Monday: Closed

FMoPA is closed on: **Independence Day** (July 4), **Thanksgiving Day** , **Christmas Eve** , **Christmas Day** , **New Year’s Eve** , and **New Year’s Day**. Please check our hours online or call before planning a visit around these dates.

[Class Field Trip Request](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSefaZrViw6lTF4go8oCwg0-ruxOcAYp9MNW06xJL_l8CZLwFQ/viewform?usp=sf_link)

[Large Group Request](https://forms.gle/p3Bm4HZoyTSiRmTH8)

# Parking

# 

Street parking and small parking lots are available throughout historic 7th Ave.  
Follow instructions for parking payments. Hours of operation for On-Street parking are  
8 a.m. to 3 a.m., 7 days per week.

Two parking garages are located within a block of 7th Ave:  
Centro Ybor Garage – 1500 E. 5th Avenue  
Fernando Noriega Jr. Garage – 2010 N. 13th Street

**Garage Daily Rates:**  
0-3 hours – $1  
3-4 hours – $3  
4-5 hours – $4  
5-6 hours – $6  
6+ hours – $8
